The Egg

Story by Andy Weir
Animated by Kurzgesagt

A Big Thanks to Andy Weir for allowing us to use
lead_intro: Have you ever wondered about the concept of reincarnation and the meaning of life? Dive into a thought-provoking story that might make you question everything you know.

quiz.question: According to the story, who is the narrator of the conversation?
quiz.explanation: In the story, the narrator reveals themselves to be God who explains the concept of reincarnation and the purpose of life to the listener.

quiz.question: What will happen to the listener after their death?
quiz.explanation: Instead of going to Heaven or Hell, the listener is told they will be reincarnated into a new life after their current one.

quiz.question: Where does the narrator suggest the listener will be reincarnated in their next life?
choices: As a Chinese peasant girl in 540 A.D.
quiz.answer: As a Chinese peasant girl in 540 A.D.
quiz.explanation: The narrator mentions that the listener will be reincarnated as a Chinese peasant girl in the year 540 A.D. in their next life.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of the universe according to the narrator?
choices: For all humans to become gods
quiz.explanation: The narrator reveals that the universe was created for the listener to mature and grow intellectually with each new life they experience.

quiz.question: Who does the narrator imply all other people in the universe are?
quiz.explanation: The narrator implies that all other people in the universe are different incarnations of the listener, suggesting that there is only the listener and the narrator in this reality.
